column1: 30603688$Apprentice Illusion Magician$Unlimited$DARK$[Spellcaster/Effect]$$$$$6$2000$1700$$$$You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Dark Magician" from your Deck to your hand. During damage calculation
column2: if your other DARK Spellcaster monster battles an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; that monster you control gains 2000 ATK/DEF during that damage calculation only.$Dark Magician/DARK/Spellcaster$$Activates from your hand/Discards for cost/Activates upon Normal Summon/Activates upon Special Summon/Adds from Deck to hand/Sends itself from hand to Graveyard for cost/Sends itself from field to Graveyard for cost$Unclassified/Trigger/Quick$
